channel.title: Spring JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPR-1869] commas cause problems in multiple selection list boxes if form holds result in array of strings
item.description:
When one item with one or more commas is selected from a multiple selection list box, e.g., "chorus, band, orchestra", an array of strings is returned, e.g.,

{"chorus", "band", "orchestra"}

. The item with commas is preserved if several items are selected or if the form holds the items in List<String> rather than String [ ].
item.summary: commas cause problems in multiple selection list boxes if form holds result in array of strings

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Steven,

If I understand this, you are binding to a String array, and one of the items in that array is 'chorus, band, orchestra'. When just this item is selected you end up with three items in the String[] but when multiple items are selected it works correctly. Can you post your form controller and view template please?

Rob
